General.Name: Goldcard High-Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Goldcard Smart Group Co., Ltd. operates as an Internet of Things company in China. It offers IC card smart gas meter and its system software, wireless smart gas meter and its system software, gas flowmeter, system software, and Internet services. The company was formerly known as Goldcard High-Tech Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Goldcard Smart Group Co., Ltd. in March 2017. Goldcard Smart Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

1.Name: Ms. Lingling  Li
1.Title: CFO & Sec. to the Board of Directors

2.Name: Ms. Fang Fen Ma
2.Title: Head of the Office of Pres and Mang. of Legal
